creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text:
This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report.   

Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: 

We understand fairness and justice instinctively. Its denial is unnatural. It thrives in our interconnectedness, love, empathy and community. It is a foundation of our humanity, and, of course, with no justice, there is no peace.
title: June 12, 2020: JUSTICE IS PEACE
